casebody.data:
No. 10-484. Brant Sitzes, Individually and as Joint Administrator of the Estate of Brittney Rae Sitzes, Deceased, et al., Petitioners v. City of West Memphis, Arkansas, et al. 562 U.S. 1109, 131 S. Ct. 828,

178 L. Ed. 2d 557,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9788. December 13, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 606 F.3d 461.
